name: The Sorcerer's Hat
author: Jiahui Eva Gao

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: When naming a card for the Incredible Energy ability of The Sorcerer's Hat, what information do I need to say about the card?
A: When naming a card for the Incredible Energy ability of The Sorcerer’s Hat, you don’t need to declare the version name, even if the named card is a character or location.

flavor_text: Minnie approached it cautiously. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps.
rules_text: INCREDIBLE ENERGY , 1 — Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.
